item.description:
Some of you other Waltham trail runners have been commiserating with me about how we're getting fitter than our kids. Here's our chance to do something about it! We'll start from the cafe, run around the common, down Riverwalk park along the river to prospect st., and back. Its a 2 mile run and we'll accommodate any paces, including tempo walkers, though we might spread out a bit. Coffee, ice cream, pastries, and good times await us at the cafe when we're done.

It's a short distance but we'll increase it when the group is ready.
item.name: Teen/youth run from Cafe on the Common 2 miles
